name: Lechonk
flavorText: It searches for food all day. It possesses a keen sense of smell but doesn’t use it for anything other than foraging.

previous.name: Quaquaval
previous.flavorText: A single kick from a Quaquaval can send a truck rolling. This Pokémon uses its powerful legs to perform striking dances from far-off lands.
